entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
